attributes.review: I went to go and open it and it took me to mars. When I got back to earth and opened it again it gave my phone a virus and every ad I ever saw was “trump is the best!” Which is not true at all. I flew to the moon on my pet snake and I saw a bunch of republicans that were eating pineapple pizza🤮 I left on my parrot and forgot my water bottle there so I went back to the moon and trump was there holding it. His hands were so gross that the mold on his hand spread to my water bottle and he went to take a drink but his orange spray tan got all over it. Absolutely worst app ever. Gen Z will go down in history!!✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 BLACK LIVES MATTER!!!
attributes.title: I HATE IT!!! ITS THE WORST!!

attributes.review: After a lot of torment over my baby ducks who are so cool, i deleted the app. it all started when Trumps app made me clean a fountain and i found the coolest baby ducks. They were such quick learners, they were graduating karate after only one day. Absolutely astounding. However, they do not support trump. This absolutely breaks my heart. I get home to daddy Trump with my ducks and they go for his ankles. Anyways, id rather not be reminded of the horror but lets just say this app makes baby animals absolutely insane. But baby ducks, where ever you are now, i miss and love you no matter what this gross app brainwashed you to do❤️
attributes.title: THIS APP IS AWFUL!!!!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking it was to support SeLeNeR🐸 but i was surprised to see our one and only POTUS Donald Duck!!🥵🥵🐒I decided to see what it was about and was enjoying it✨ until all of a sudden my dog decides to take a PHAT  GREEN 💩 on my bedroom floor!!🤮🤮😼i didn’t think it could any weirder until Daddy Danny Devito😈😫🥴🤰RAN into my room with a bib,fork, and knife🍴and started eating it!!😯🧚🏻 i had read the read the reviews that warned me that this app was weird🦹🏻‍♂️👁👅👁 but i thought they were just jokes!!!!!👀🤡👻I WAS WRONG!!!😬🤢🤠 anyways, does anyone know how to get 💩 out of your teeth?🦷🙏🏽theres some stuck in mine🙀🤦🏽‍♂️👯🌸✨☀️🍄KeEp An EyÉ👁oUt FoR SeLeNeR🌲🌝🦨
attributes.title: trè

attributes.review: I opened the app to see a terrible looking Cheeto that also looked deformed. my eyes started bleeding from all the pain I went through. I wish I could tell you that it gets better but frankly I would be lying to u. I tried to continue but the orange Cheeto popped outta the screen and started crawling around on my floor. it was making these terrible noises that caused me to lose my hearing. with my terrible eyesight from bleeding and the fact that I just went deaf, I grabbed a fly swatter and smacked it just about 1000 times. i had to light it on fire as well. overall it was okay
attributes.title: horribly terrifying app

attributes.review: This app tried to sell me fascist ideals. Every hour on the hour I would get a push notification that would spew nonsense, always ending with a quote from the bible. I am jewish, and I take MAJOR offense to having not only these awful ideals pushed on me, but also a religion that hides abusers and raises them as prophets of god, publishes their hatred of all groups except white men, and ripped off every major religion to come before it. In short, you should totally download this app if you want almost 30 notifications a day, and to read the crap that Rapist Donald Trump came up with in his little pea sized orange colored brain.
attributes.title: Worst App EVER

attributes.review: Terrible app! Absolutely terrible. I’ve seen many apps before, believe me. You can ask anybody that knows me they would say “they know what a good app looks like” and, sadly, this is not it! It made my phone glitch shortly after it’s download, and runs super slow! Also, to make things worse, every time I would open the app a cat would jump through my open window. Not even a cute one either, one that would scratch my face. Not only that but once it saw Trump’s face on my phone it only got crazier, and started foaming at the mouth. I do believe this app is cursed, DO NOT DOWNLOAD😡😤
attributes.title: BOWLIES

attributes.review: So i downloaded this app because i was encouraged🦋 *cough *cough✨, as i opened the app my phone started glitching🤢, sofia the firsf jumped out of a portel and tried to attack with her sword🙄, then she went in my basment and killed my turtles☹️, i asked why she did such a thing and she said trump sent her to kill everyones pets😱, then my phone starts to glitch again🦄 and clifford the red dog jumped through the screen🤓, he said that if i dont vote for trump he will step on me with his elephant leg🤨, i was confused but scared😳, and i ran away👁👄👁, so im telling yall dont download this app or your pets will die, and yu might get squished with a elephant leg🥳.
attributes.title: ✨scared✨

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. This app will allow the government to track everything you do, and know everything you say, basically this app allows the government to stalk your personal life. This app will DESTROY your phone, your phone will glitch bad and will have to buy a new one cause its glitching so bad. This app is ran by PEDOPHILES, if you download this app then you are a new target and most likely will get followed by old creepy men with long noses and long thin hair riding motorcycles. If you want to have a normal life then i suggest that you don't download this app. This app to so horrible they might aswell DELETE IT AND NEVER BRING IT BACK !!!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I just wanted to check out this app giving the Cheeto man a chance in office. But as soon as I open the app I was given an alert that it’s knows I’m a black women. I was the bombarded with videos whit the President downgrading my black brothers and sister with him saying things like “Most of you are unemployed.” and “You guys don’t have a great education.” I also received a video about him mocking George Floyd saying “I can’t breathe officer. I can’t breath.” So yeah I just don’t recommend this app if you are Black, Spanish,  Asian, part of the LGBTQ+ community… in a matter of fact I don’t recommend this app to anyone. PERRIODTTTT
attributes.title: Just Terrible

attributes.review: this is by far the worst app on the entire app store. i was out at the store today and i didn’t bring my phone with me bc i only needed to get some things but when i came home i saw that the app was open and my homework was ripped to shreds!!!! this app ATE MY HOMEWORK. AND EVER SINCE THAT HAPPENED MY FISH HAVE BEEN HAVING DIARRHEA EVERY DAY. i deleted the app immediately when i realized what it was doing and thank god i did bc i watched the news and it said there was a terrible snow storm coming into north carolina but it was turning around for some reason, thank god i deleted that app or i would have been buried in snow for days!!!!
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP PLEASE
